attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To accept the of The House of Lords Appointments Commission view that elevating Mr Martin, the first Speaker to be ousted in 300 years, would damage the reputation of the second chamber and to ask Her Majesty The Queen not to offer Mr Martin a peerage

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
